**2022-11-30 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @andybons, @julieqiu**

**Accepted**

- **crypto/ecdh: provide and/or implement an interface** [#56052](https://go.dev/issue/56052)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **os: TempDir should use GetTempPath2 when available on Windows** [#56899](https://go.dev/issue/56899)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **spec: add clear(x) builtin, to clear map, zero content of slice** [#56351](https://go.dev/issue/56351)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **spec: allow basic interface types to instantiate comparable type parameters** [#56548](https://go.dev/issue/56548)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/exp/slices: add ContainsFunc** [#53983](https://go.dev/issue/53983)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/tools/cmd/cover: isolate, tag, and delete package** [#56783](https://go.dev/issue/56783)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **crypto/x509: Add support for OtherName SAN** [#55897](https://go.dev/issue/55897)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **runtime: support to call finalizing function when \`throw()\` is called** [#56702](https://go.dev/issue/56702)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **bytes, strings: add ContainsFunc** [#54386](https://go.dev/issue/54386)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- none
